id.description: The unique identifier of the discount code.

version.description: The version number of the discount code.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the discount code was created.

createdBy.description: The user who created the discount code.

lastModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the discount code was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the discount code.

name.description: The name of the discount code.

description.description: A brief description or name of the discount code.

code.description: The unique code that customers use to apply the discount.

cartDiscounts.description: Discounts applicable to the cart when the code is used.

groups.description: Groups or categories to which the discount code may belong.

isActive.description: Indicates if the discount code is currently active.

validFrom.description: The date and time from which the discount code is valid for use.

validUntil.description: The date and time until which the discount code is valid for use.

references.description: References to other entities or resources linked to the discount code.

maxApplications.description: The maximum number of times the discount code can be applied.

maxApplicationsPerCustomer.description: The maximum number of times a single customer can use the discount code.

custom.description: Custom attributes or data associated with the discount code.

applicationVersion.description: The version of the application where the discount code was created.

attributeTypes.description: The types of attributes associated with the discount code.

cartFieldTypes.description: The types of fields associated with the cart.

customLineItemFieldTypes.description: The types of custom fields associated with line items.

lineItemFieldTypes.description: The types of fields associated with line items.

versionModifiedAt.description: The date and time when the version of the discount code was last modified.
